Plot: A look at the life of Alfred Kinsey, a pioneer in the area of human sexuality research, whose 1948 publication "Sexual Behavior in the Human Male" was one of the first recorded works that saw science address sexual behavior.
Title: Kinsey
Actors: Liam Neeson, Laura Linney, Chris O'Donnell, Peter Sarsgaard
tomatoConsensus: A biopic of the sex researcher is hailed as adventurous, clever, and subversive, with fine performances by Liam Neeson and Laura Linney.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 17 wins & 48 nominations.
